Sentencas: Iron-base alloys (Fe-Cr) are proposed hereafter as materials for interconnect of planar-type intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell (ITSOFC); they are an alternative solution instead of the use of ceramic interconnects.
Titulo: Opportunity of metallic interconnects for ITSOFC: Reactivity and electrical property

Sentencas: These steels form an oxide layer (chrornia) which protects the interconnect from the exterior environment, but is an electrical insulator.
Titulo: Opportunity of metallic interconnects for ITSOFC: Reactivity and electrical property

Sentencas: One solution envisaged in this work is the deposition of a reactive element oxide coating, that slows down the formation of the oxide layer and that increases its electric conductivity.
Titulo: Opportunity of metallic interconnects for ITSOFC: Reactivity and electrical property

Titulo: Opportunity of metallic interconnects for ITSOFC: Reactivity and electrical property
Opportunity of metallic interconnects for ITSOFC: Reactivity and electrical property

Sentencas: On the reactive element oxide-coated alloy, the parabolic rate constant, k(p), decreases to 1.3 x 10(-13) g(2) cm(-4) s(-1).
Titulo: Opportunity of metallic interconnects for ITSOFC: Reactivity and electrical property

Sentencas: At 800 degrees C, the area-specific resistance of Fe-30Cr alloys is about 0.03 Omega cm(2) after 24 h in laboratory air under atmospheric pressure.
Titulo: Opportunity of metallic interconnects for ITSOFC: Reactivity and electrical property

Sentencas: The Y2O3 coating reduces the electrical resistance 10-fold.
Titulo: Opportunity of metallic interconnects for ITSOFC: Reactivity and electrical property

Sentencas: This indicates that the application of Y2O3 coatings on Fe-30Cr alloy allows to use it as an interconnect for SOFC.
Titulo: Opportunity of metallic interconnects for ITSOFC: Reactivity and electrical property
